description.narrative: Evaluations are important instruments of accountability in development cooperation, and contribute to our future effective strategy planning. Ireland commmits to it's IATI commitments by publishing aid information in IATI’s electronic format (XML) on the Irish Aid website – before linking it to the IATI Registry. The Registry acts as an online catalogue and index of links to all of the raw data published to the IATI Standard.

The Irish Aid programme is subject to regular internal and external monitoring. Irish Aid progresses incrementally towards full implementation of its aid transparency commitments. This budget line also contains payments to the International Aid Transparency Initiative (IATI). IATI is a voluntary, multi-stakeholder initiative that seeks to improve the transparency of aid, development, and humanitarian resources in order to increase their effectiveness in tackling poverty
